name: Humanities/Arts Class 11 & Class 12 CBSE NCERT App
description: The Humanities / Arts Class 11 and Class 12 App is the best education app for students preparing for Boards. Its an online coach with and best app for ARTS video lectures which provides Humanities Syllabus, study material, Notes, Problems, Important Questions, Books (Free) available for download, which will help you to clear your doubts.  The Arts Class 11 and Class 12 App provides a comprehensive preparation study package for the students studying for exams. It provides free access to an online test series for finals Main with 12 chapter-wise mock tests by a premier institute of the country. Along with that, it provides past or previous year papers with detailed solutions in the form of online tests, which a student can attempt to practice the paper as per the pattern of the real examination.
